title: Staff of Cherished Necromancy
content:
Thibault, Cherish Hollow was not afraid of zombies. Cherish was afraid of sharia, liquoriee, wallpaper, Netherese artefacts, hats (large), the outdoors, the indoors, hats (small), and milk pails. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 480

Staff of Cherished Necromancy

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Necrotic

Heightened Necromancy: Creatures have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against your Necromancy spells.

Life Essence Harvest: When the wielder kills a hostile creatur
